problems.title: Pyramid Pattern
problems.description:
Write a program to print a pyramid pattern of stars of height n.

Input Format:
A single integer n.

Output Format:
Print the pattern as shown in the examples. Note the spaces before the stars.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
3

Sample Output
  *
 ***
*****

Explanation:
A pyramid of height 3 is printed.
hintsList: Number of spaces decreases, stars increase by 2.
